## Andic languages [@moroz20]

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lingtypology)

read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sverhees/master_villages/master/data/villages.tsv") %>% 
  filter(aff == "Andic",
         lat > 42,
         lat < 43) ->
  df

map.feature(df$lang,
            features = df$lang,
            lat  = df$lat,
            long = df$lon,
            tile = "Esri.WorldGrayCanvas", 
            minimap = TRUE)
```
